{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:50:51.679

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:51:03.199

    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:51:06.519
    | text      = business practices.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = True.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:51:08.519
    | text      = I'm fine with that being like, yeah, yeah, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:51:11.679
    | text      = But I really find what he's saying about Tim Cook to be pretty offensive.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:51:14.079
    | text      = And I want to tell you why.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:51:16.440
    | text      = Alex is assuming that he's being targeted by Tim Cook in part because he won't stop
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:51:19.679
    | text      = talking about how Tim Cook is gay.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:51:22.199
    | text      = Alex says that Tim Cook is major pissed at him about it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:51:25.820
    | text      = And this framing of how Alex is describing his problems with Cook is where things become
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:51:29.780
    | text      = really problematic.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:51:31.039
    | text      = Also, that horrible voice is not helping.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:51:33.880
    | text      = No, that, that was, ugh.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:51:36.159
    | text      = Alex's criticism isn't that Tim Cook is running suicide factories in China.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:51:40.159
    | text      = It's that he's running suicide factories in China and no one except Alex calls him out
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:51:44.199
    | text      = on it because everyone else is blinded by Tim Cook's sexuality.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:51:48.420
    | text      = This is an important distinction because Alex doesn't give a shit about people working in
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:51:52.019
    | text      = unsafe conditions.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:51:53.519
    | text      = He's staunchly anti-union and his favorite politician, Ron Paul, frequently introduced
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:51:58.059
    | text      = bills to eliminate OSHA.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:00.019
    | text      = The things that eliminated, uh, here, many of the, uh, the terrible parts of the conditions
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:04.500
    | text      = in Chinese factories are things that Alex is explicitly and actively against.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:08.820
    | text      = So his complaints about the plight of workers in China seems really hollow to me.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:12.239
    | text      = I want to be clear about something, and that is that I support the workers of China and
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:16.599
    | text      = nothing I'm about to say here should be interpreted as me minimizing the difficult and exploitative
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:21.400
    | text      = situation that many of them are in.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:23.699
    | text      = What I'm going to say here is specifically about how little Alex Jones knows about China
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:28.480
    | text      = and Apple.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:30.519
    | text      = Every single time Alex talks about China and Apple, he brings up suicide nets.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:35.039
    | text      = That's the only frame of reference he has for the story, and I understand why.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:38.900
    | text      = It's a horrifying image, people killing themselves at their workplace.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:42.519
    | text      = It's bleak, it's relatable, and it's very resonant with the audience of people who may
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:46.460
    | text      = not totally love their jobs.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:48.920
    | text      = For some context, though, this story about nets is from 2011, and Alex is specifically
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:54.119
    | text      = leaving out the part of that story where, in addition to installing that net, Foxconn
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:58.599
    | text      = also responded to a rash of suicides by raising the wages of employees, which was one of the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:03.719
    | text      = motivations ascribed to the people who jumped off the roof previously.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:07.960
    | text      = Alex has been repeating this story as if it's current for eight years.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:11.599
    | text      = Meanwhile, from 2012 to the present, four employees have killed themselves at the Foxconn
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:16.440
    | text      = factory that Alex is talking about, which is four too many, but let's try and put this
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:20.579
    | text      = in perspective.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:22.199
    | text      = For one, the Foxconn factory is not like most factories that we imagine.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:26.820
    | text      = It's fucking gigantic, with a staff that's ten times the size of the largest factory
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:31.320
    | text      = in the United States.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:32.980
    | text      = According to Business Insider, they employ about 350,000 people, which is approximately
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:38.639
    | text      = 40,000 more people than live in St. Louis.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:42.199
    | text      = In 2017, 43 people killed themselves in St. Louis.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:46.920
    | text      = So you look at just rates of numbers of people.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:50.639
    | text      = In 2016, 291 people killed themselves at the workplace in the United States.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:56.639
    | text      = While China has a whole lot of work to do in terms of working conditions, we have our
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:00.440
    | text      = own problems at home that we should be addressing too, and I've never heard Alex bring up U.S.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:05.239
    | text      = workplace suicides, ever.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:07.599
    | text      = Similarly, I've never heard him talk about France Telecom, which had more than 60 employees
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:12.679
    | text      = commit suicide between 2008 and 2011.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:16.000
    | text      = That's far more than the number of people who killed themselves at the Foxconn plant,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:19.639
    | text      = and Telecom has a way smaller workforce of employees, so the rate is substantially higher.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:25.480
    | text      = Alex doesn't talk about that either, not because he's covering it up, but because he doesn't
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:29.079
    | text      = care.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:30.079
    | text      = There's no reason to attack a French phone company.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:32.260
    | text      = It's not in his interests.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:34.039
    | text      = Alex has an evocative image from news from eight years ago, and he uses it daily as a
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:39.320
    | text      = weapon to attack the people he perceives as his enemies, demanding they solve an issue
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:43.519
    | text      = he doesn't care about and knows that the only real solution to is government-regulating
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:48.440
    | text      = business, which he's super against.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:50.940
    | text      = It's a trick.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:52.179
    | text      = He's playing a trick on his audience by appealing to the emotion that very reasonably and rightfully
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:58.000
    | text      = should be evoked by the idea of a factory putting up nets to stop people from killing
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:03.119
    | text      = themselves.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:04.119
    | text      = He's using that as a trick.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:05.920
    | text      = Yeah, it almost seems like he's mad that they're killing themselves in China.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:11.840
    | text      = The factory job should be coming here, and our workers should be killing themselves.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:15.519
    | text      = Well, he certainly wouldn't be talking about it if they did.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:18.280
    | text      = Exactly.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:19.280
    | text      = So when I see Alex behaving this way and wearing the costume of someone who cares about the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:23.139
    | text      = working conditions of Chinese factory employees, I don't believe him.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:26.800
    | text      = It's just an easy way for him to attack Google, and it's definitely not the reason why he's
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:31.400
    | text      = attacking Google.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:32.519
    | text      = It's not his motivation.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:34.360
    | text      = When you hear him make the argument that no one will criticize Tim Cook for the Chinese
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:37.460
    | text      = factories because he's gay, that is an attack on Tim Cook specifically because he's gay.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:43.039
    | text      = He's basically saying that his being gay gives him an elevated status that wouldn't be afforded
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:48.199
    | text      = to a heterosexual CEO, and that's complete shit.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:52.320
    | text      = It's important to point this sort of thing out, while still being very clear that Fox
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:55.360
    | text      = Con and everybody else needs to do a better job for their workers.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:58.719
    | text      = You can accept that as a true thing and still call this sort of bullshit out, and here's
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:03.760
    | text      = why that's important.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:05.000
    | text      = Jordan, did you know that Tim Cook is literally the first Fortune 500 CEO to be openly gay?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:10.239
    | text      = I did not know that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:11.559
    | text      = Fortune 500 has been published since 1955, and Tim Cook became CEO in 2011 and didn't
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:18.000
    | text      = come out until 2014.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:20.480
    | text      = That's a good, I don't know, 69 years where representation didn't exist for young aspiring
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:25.800
    | text      = LGBTQ business folks.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:28.159
    | text      = There was no one to point to and think, I could belong in that boardroom, and I'm not
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:32.800
    | text      = just assuming that's the case.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:34.679
    | text      = That's the reason he came out in 2014.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:37.679
    | text      = In an interview with CNN, Cook describes how there had been rumors about his sexuality,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:41.920
    | text      = but he kept his life private until he started to receive letters from youth who had been
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:46.239
    | text      = bullied because of their orientation, and he realized that it would be, quote, selfish
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:50.880
    | text      = for him to keep quiet when being public could help those people.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
